snippet.title: Mayday HD - MissingNo. Gameplay
snippet.description:
I'll be posting a new video every day until the release of Mayday HD showcasing one of the new characters! This one is MissingNo.

In order to round out Mayday HD's roster to a good 32, I needed to add one more character. I ended up picking a character from Smashed and Boiled, since the games share similar enough mechanics I could do it without much of a hassle.
Because of this, MissingNo. varies slightly from the rest of the Mayday roster by being floatier. He can dish out a lot of damage but struggles to kill outside of his Neutral Special.
